title: Gordon Ramsey, did the whole crew take a knee, refuse to serve Miami Dolphins?
subtitle: A notorious news site published a rumor that Ramsey rudely kicked Miami Dolphins out of his restaurant for "knee" during the national anthem.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: The celebrity chief (Gorden Ramsay) ordered all his employees to "take a knee" and refuse to serve the players (Miami Dolphins) because of the national anthem protests against police brutality.
